parameter.name: ignoreDrafts
parameter.description: Set this field to 1 if you want to exclude drafts. Otherwise, set to zero (0).

parameter.name: ignoreSending
parameter.description: Set this field to 1 if you want to exclude currently sending campaigns. Otherwise, set to zero (0).

parameter.name: ignorePaused
parameter.description: Set this field to 1 if you want to exclude paused campaigns. Otherwise, set to zero (0).

parameter.name: ignoreSent
parameter.description: Set this field to 1 if you want to exclude sent campaigns. Otherwise, set to zero (0).

parameter.name: ignoreFailed
parameter.description: Set this field to 1 if you want to exclude failed campaigns. Otherwise, set to zero (0).

parameter.name: ignoreApproval
parameter.description: Set this field to 1 if you want to exclude approval pending campaigns. Otherwise, set to zero (0).
